item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 14 [updated live]: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna’s film hits Rs 973 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 14 [Updated Live]

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The mass entertainer ‘Pushpa 2’, starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to set records at the box office even after two weeks of release, nearing the Rs 1000 crore mark.

  • As of day 14, the film has collected a total of Rs 973.2 crore in India across all languages.
  • The day-wise collection indicates a steady performance, with notable earnings across Telugu (Rs 293.3 Cr) and Hindi (Rs 607.35 Cr).
  • The film is only Rs 26.2 crore short of reaching the Rs 1000 crore club.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has received a 3.5-star rating from ETimes, with praise for its direction and narrative depth.
“Director Sukumar’s brilliance shines through in 'Pushpa 2: The Rule.'”

‘Pushpa 2’ is set to be released on OTT in February 2025, with Netflix acquiring the rights for its streaming.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital - News18
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: News18

Allu Arjun’s father, Allu Aravind, visited a Hyderabad hospital to check on a child injured in the December 4 stampede during the screening of 'Pushpa 2: The Rule'. He also met with the family of the deceased woman.

  • Allu Aravind visited the injured child in the hospital.
  • The health of the child is critical; he has suffered brain damage and is on ventilator support.
  • Telangana Health Secretary and Hyderabad Police Commissioner also visited and provided updates on the child's condition.
  • The stampede resulted in the death of a 35-year-old woman and severe injuries to her 9-year-old son.
“I remain deeply concerned about young Sri Tej, who is under constant medical care after the unfortunate incident. My prayers remain with them...” - Allu Arjun

This incident has brought significant attention to safety measures during public events.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts pink of health - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts pink of health

Date: December 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Pisces horoscope for today suggests a favorable outlook in love, health, and professional endeavors, with a warning to avoid gossip.

  • Confident and productive day expected.
  • Ensure love life remains cheerful and productive in professional tasks.
  • Health is positive; engage in mild exercise and a balanced diet.
  • Avoid office gossip and focus on important tasks.
  • Financial caution recommended, particularly in stock markets.
  • Pisces natives may find new job opportunities in creative fields.
"Your love life will be cheerful and health is also positive."

In conclusion, today marks a promising day for Pisces in various life aspects but requires mindfulness regarding expenditures and relationships.

item.title: Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts luck for traders - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 to know your astrological predictions

Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Dr. J.N Pandey

Traders and entrepreneurs are predicted to make money today, with a generally positive outlook for Capricorns.

  • Relationship issues should be set aside to improve workplace dynamics.
  • Opportunities to exhibit professional skills are on the horizon.
  • Financial challenges are not expected today, with good health indicated.
  • Capricorns may fall in love with a colleague and could revive past romantic relationships.
  • New business opportunities are anticipated, particularly for those in creative fields.
  • Health advisories include being cautious with adventurous activities and maintaining a healthy diet.
"Financial hiccups won't exist and health will be good today."

Overall, the horoscope suggests a favorable day for Capricorns with emphasis on career growth, personal relationships, and health maintenance.

item.title: Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts a new property - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024

Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Today’s horoscope predictions for Scorpio suggest a day filled with creativity in love and prosperity in financial matters. It's essential to maintain harmony in relationships and manage responsibilities effectively.

  • Creative love life with a focus on time spent with partners.
  • Handle multiple responsibilities at work efficiently.
  • Financial success and resolution of old financial issues.
  • Health is generally stable, though minor issues may arise.
  • Avoid gossip to keep relationships happy and healthy.
“Today is also good to propose or to receive a proposal.”

In conclusion, Scorpios can expect a day of positive developments in love and finances, along with a reminder to focus on maintaining healthy relationships.

item.title: Taurus Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts a positive response soon - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Taurus Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 to know your astrological predictions. Propose someone today to receive a positive response.

Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope suggests a day filled with potential positive responses, especially in relationships. While wealth favors Taurus today, health should be monitored closely.

  • Propose someone today for a positive response.
  • Love life is highlighted with pleasant moments; ensure not to dwell on past issues.
  • Work may bring new challenges; management trusts you with important tasks.
  • Health issues may arise; pay attention to breath-related concerns.
  • Wealth management is crucial; avoid lending large amounts.
"Wealth is at your side today; however, health demands attention."

The day looks promising with opportunities for love and prosperity, but vigilance in health is necessary.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts opportunities will knock - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 19, 2024 predicts opportunities will knock

Today's horoscope for Aquarius advises positive interactions in relationships and careful attention to opportunities at work. Good health predominates, but be mindful of finances.

  • Careful handling of wealth is advised.
  • Be open to new job opportunities that may arise.

Overall, today is a day filled with potential for Aquarius natives, urging them to seize opportunities while balancing their personal and professional lives.

item.title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction for December 19, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Horoscope Today: Astrological Prediction for December 19, 2024

Publication Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Astrology offers insight into what each zodiac sign can expect for the day. This article provides detailed predictions and advice tailored to each sign's traits.

  • Aries: Expect unexpected costs; meaningful time with family; morning jogs are beneficial.
  • Taurus: Balanced diet advised; promising real estate investments; consider starting a family.
  • Gemini: Financial improvements anticipated; challenge in work; support from siblings.
  • Cancer: Expect recognition at work; health favored; family time enjoyable.
  • Leo: Improve health through diet; profitable property returns; positive family interactions.
  • Virgo: Financial boosts; improved work atmosphere; fitness activities encouraged.
  • Libra: Favorable professional opportunities; need for careful financial management.
  • Scorpio: Achievements in work; stable finances; family debates over decisions.
  • Sagittarius: Property gains expected; emotional family support; prioritize tasks.
  • Capricorn: Anticipate financial growth; fulfilling work pace; avoid rushing property decisions.
  • Aquarius: Seize professional opportunities; family relations improving; consider new property purchase.
  • Pisces: Gradual financial improvement; focus on creating memories; plan for vacation.
"A healthy lifestyle could bring long-term positive results."

This horoscope offers valuable insights to guide individuals throughout their day, highlighting opportunities and challenges specific to each sign.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 14 (Early Trends): Allu Arjun Is Only 8.5 Crore Away To Axe The Highest Grossing Film Of 2024! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 14 (Early Trends): Allu Arjun Is Only 8.5 Crore Away To Axe The Highest Grossing

Publication Date: December 18, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2’s Hindi version is on the verge of achieving a historic box office record, currently standing at 619 crore after 14 days, maintaining a daily earning of over 15 crore.

  • Day 1: 72 crore
  • Day 2: 59 crore
  • Day 3: 74 crore
  • Day 4: 86 crore
  • Day 5: 48 crore
  • Day 6: 36 crore
  • Day 7: 31.50 crore
  • Day 8: 27 crore
  • Day 9: 27.50 crore
  • Day 10: 46.50 crore
  • Day 11: 54 crore
  • Day 12: 20.50 crore
  • Day 13: 19.50 crore
  • Day 14: 17.5 crore*

Total: 619 crore*

Now, Allu Arjun would be only 8 – 8.5 crore away from beating Stree 2.

This film continues to be a strong contender at the box office, showing remarkable consistency throughout its run.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh’s post-wedding red-hot look breaks the internet - 123telugu
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh’s Post-Wedding Red-Hot Look Breaks the Internet

Published on Dec 19, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Following her private wedding in Goa to long-time boyfriend Anthony, Keerthy Suresh is back promoting her new film, Baby John, shortly after her marriage.

  • Keerthy appeared in a striking red dress enhancing her post-wedding glamour.
  • She sported her mangalsutra in the promotional photos.
  • Baby John stars Varun Dhawan and is directed by Kalees.
  • The promotion has generated significant buzz online.
“The internet is abuzz with her striking post-wedding glamour.”

This captivating look, combined with her return to the film industry, has solidified Keerthy Suresh's presence in the media following her recent marriage.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 14 (Early Trends): 1 Record, 7 Long Years & Only 42 Crores Away – Allu Arjun Is Set To Rewrite History! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 14 (Early Trends): 1 Record, 7 Long Years & Only 42 Crores Away

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 continues to dominate the box office, breaking records as it approaches the all-time highest-grossing Indian films.

Key Points:

  • Day 14 collections estimated between 22-23 crores.
  • Total earnings over two weeks stand between 988.75-989.75 crores.
  • Third biggest second Wednesday for Hindi films, earning 16.50-17.50 crores.
  • Only 42 crores away from surpassing Baahubali 2's record.
  • Currently the second highest grosser in India across all languages.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Pushpa 2 is now only 42 crores away from surpassing Baahubali 2. And that will be a moment to celebrate, as the record will be broken after 7 long years!”

As the film continues to thrive, it garners excitement and anticipation for breaking long-standing box office records.

item.title: FFI jury member Jahnu Barua reacts to criticism against 'Laapataa Ladies' not making it to Oscars shortli - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Jahnu Barua Addresses Criticism of 'Laapataa Ladies' Not Making Oscars Shortlist

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Jahnu Barua, a jury member of the Oscars, responded to the criticism regarding the film 'Laapataa Ladies' not making it to the shortlist. He expressed that the competing film 'All We Imagine as Light' was technically 'very poor'.

  • Barua's comments came after backlash regarding the selection process.
  • 'Laapataa Ladies' was anticipated to perform well based on its storytelling.
  • The jury faced scrutiny for their choices this awards season.
“All We Imagine as Light was technically very poor,” said Barua.

This statement has ignited discussions around the criteria for film selection in prestigious awards.

item.description:
Salim Khan struggles with stairs, grandson Arhaan helps dadi Salma and Helen as the Khan family reunites for lunch at Malaika Arora’s new restaurant

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The Khan family came together for a heartwarming lunch, highlighting the close family bonds despite the challenges faced by Salim Khan.

  • Salim Khan, a prominent figure, struggles with mobility.
  • His grandson Arhaan is seen assisting elderly family members.
  • The gathering took place at Malaika Arora’s newly opened restaurant.
  • The lunch symbolizes a reunion of family connections.
“Family is everything, and togetherness matters the most.”

This gathering emphasizes the importance of family support, especially as members age.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 14: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna film mints over ₹973 crore in 2 weeks - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 14: Sukumar's sequel to his 2021 blockbuster stars Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The film Pushpa 2: The Rule has achieved remarkable success, earning over ₹973 crore net in India within its first two weeks of release. The sequel to the 2021 blockbuster has seen fluctuations in its weekly collections, particularly enjoying a spike in the second week.

  • The film earned ₹18.83 crore net on its second Wednesday.
  • It collected ₹725.8 crore net in its first week.
  • Week two included a surge with collections of ₹63.3 crore and ₹76.6 crore over the weekend.
  • A tragic incident during its premiere led to the arrest of Allu Arjun, followed by a release on bail.
  • Allu Aravind visited a child victim hospitalized after the stampede incident.
“I just visited Sri Tej in the ICU. I have spoken to the doctors looking after him. The boy has been recovering slowly in the last 10 days, but it might take longer.” - Allu Aravind

The success of Pushpa 2 highlights the film's immense popularity and the challenges it faced due to unfortunate incidents during its premiere. The ongoing recovery efforts following the stampede continue to draw public attention.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 14: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna film mints over ₹971 crore in 2 weeks - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 14: Sukumar's Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil-starrer is going strong at the box office.

Publication Date: Dec 18, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2: The Rule completed its two-week run at the box office, earning a total of over ₹971 crore in India.

  • The film earned ₹18.83 crore net in India on its second Wednesday.
  • It made ₹725.8 crore net during its first week.
  • The second week's performance included significant earnings over the weekend.
“I just visited Sri Tej in the ICU. I have spoken to the doctors looking after him. The boy has been recovering slowly in the last 10 days, but it might take longer. We are ready to support in any way we can to help him recover.” - Allu Aravind

The film continues to perform well in cinemas while also dealing with the consequences of a tragic incident linked to its premiere.

item.title: Was reminded of Amitabh Bachchan's 'Hum' while playing dual roles in 'Baby John': Varun Dhawan - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Inspired by Amitabh Bachchan's 'Hum' While Playing Dual Roles in 'Baby John'

Date: Date not specified
Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood star Varun Dhawan shared that he drew inspiration from Amitabh Bachchan's classic film 'Hum' while preparing for his dual roles in the upcoming film 'Baby John'.

  • Dhawan emphasizes the impact of Amitabh Bachchan's work on new actors.
  • 'Hum', directed by Mukul Anand, featured a storyline about a dock worker who reshapes his identity to protect his family.
  • Dhawan described 'Baby John' as the most emotionally challenging role of his career.
  • The film marks the Hindi production debut of Atlee and features a strong supporting cast.
  • Dhawan expressed his gratitude towards the production team and collaborators, highlighting the challenges of releasing films in the current environment.
  • 'Baby John' is set to be released on December 25.
“There were certain scenes where I felt emotionally drained... sometimes I would just break down,” Dhawan reflects on his role.

This film is a notable entry in the holiday slate for Bollywood and showcases both established and new talent.

item.title: Alia Bhatt Defends Ranbir Kapoor Against Trolls; Allu Arjun's Father Visits Stampede Victim's Husband - News18
item.description:
Alia Bhatt Supports Ranbir Kapoor Amid Trolls; Allu Arjun's Father Visits Stampede Victim's Family

Date: December 19, 2024

Source: News18

Alia Bhatt defended her husband, Ranbir Kapoor, against recent trolling regarding his behavior at an event, while Allu Arjun's father paid a visit to a stampede victim's family in the hospital.

  • Alia Bhatt liked a post supporting Ranbir Kapoor after he was trolled for allegedly ignoring her at Raj Kapoor's 100th birth anniversary.
  • Ranbir has faced criticism for being labeled ‘misogynist’ by some fans.
  • Allu Arjun's father, Allu Aravind, visited victims of a stampede that occurred while screening 'Pushpa 2: The Rule'.
  • He met with the family of the deceased as well as the child who was injured.
“They don’t understand the context.” – Alia Bhatt on the trolling of Ranbir Kapoor.

This situation highlights the pressures faced by celebrities and the responsibility they bear regarding public perception.

item.title: After giving birth to daughter, Radhika Apte confesses neither she nor husband ‘wanted kids, but there was this one per cent curiosity…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Radhika Apte Opens Up About Unexpected Motherhood Journey

Date: December 2024
Source: Indian Express

Radhika Apte reflects candidly on her unexpected journey into motherhood, sharing her initial shock upon learning of her pregnancy.

  • Apte and her husband had not planned for kids but felt a curiosity about parenthood.
  • She describes the moment of realization as a mix of surprise and humor.
  • Counseling psychologist Priyamvada Tendulkar comments on the identity shift new mothers experience.
  • Strategies to navigate motherhood include accepting uncertainty and challenging perfectionism.
  • The importance of normalizing conversations about the complex emotions of motherhood is emphasized.
“I think it’s easier when people know whether they want a child or not... there was this one per cent curiosity about what it would be like.” - Radhika Apte

Radhika’s story encourages a more nuanced conversation about motherhood, focusing on self-discovery and acceptance of mixed feelings.

item.title: Nayanthara signs her next: This happening director helms the film - 123telugu
item.description:
Nayanthara signs her next: This happening director helms the film

Published on Dec 18, 2024 9:01 pm IST

Nayanthara, known for her dynamic roles in Indian cinema, is making headlines with her latest project directed by Nithilan.

“Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting project!”

This upcoming film signifies another step in Nayanthara's career as she continues to take on diverse roles in the industry.

item.title: Lawyer Sana Raees Khan comes out in support of Allu Arjun after his arrest for Pushpa 2 stampede: 'Holdin - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Lawyer Sana Raees Khan comes out in support of Allu Arjun after his arrest for Pushpa 2 stampede: 'Holding him accountable for actions...'

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: [Insert Source]

Lawyer Sana Raees Khan defends actor Allu Arjun following his arrest linked to a stampede incident during the promotion of the film 'Pushpa 2'. She emphasizes that accountability lies with those overseeing event security.

  • Sana Raees Khan expresses support for Allu Arjun.
  • The incident involved a stampede during film promotions.
  • Khan highlights the responsibility of event organizers for safety.
"Holding him accountable for actions that were beyond his control is unjust."

This situation raises questions about safety measures in large public gatherings and the responsibilities of celebrities in such contexts.

item.title: Arbaaz Khan visits Malaika Arora and Arhaan's new restaurant for lunch with parents Salim Khan, Salma Khan and Helen; WATCH - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Arbaaz Khan Enjoys Lunch at Malaika Arora's New Restaurant with Family

Date: December 18, 2024  |  Source: Pinkvilla

Arbaaz Khan joined Malaika Arora and their son Arhaan for a family lunch at their new restaurant, along with his parents Salim Khan, Salma Khan, and Helen. Heartwarming moments were captured in a video showcasing family interactions.

  • Arhaan assisting his grandmother Salma and Helen with stairs.
  • Malaika looked stunning in a black outfit.
  • Arbaaz was dressed casually in a blue-and-white striped shirt.
  • Family bonding moments were highlighted in viral videos.
“Arhaan resembles his father, Arbaaz, in many lovable ways,” Malaika shared about their son.

This gathering showcases the Khans' strong family ties despite past separations, emphasizing their commitment to co-parenting and mutual support.

item.title: BTS’s Jungkook Shares Heartwarming Update On Military Life With Jimin - Koreaboo
item.description:
BTS's Jungkook Shares Heartwarming Update On Military Life With Jimin

Publication Date: December 18, 2024

Source: Koreaboo

Today, BTS's Jungkook shocked fans with a sudden livestream for the first time since his military enlistment, expressing how much he missed them.

  • Jungkook posted on Weverse, sharing his feelings of missing his fans.
  • During the livestream, he discussed various topics, including his haircut and military experiences.
  • He reassured fans that he and Jimin are doing well in their military service.

“I’m working hard serving [in the military] with Jimin hyung and we’re doing well!” — Jungkook

This heartwarming interaction delighted fans, who were pleased to receive updates about both Jungkook and Jimin's well-being during their service.

item.title: Allu Aravind visits Pushpa 2 premiere stampede victim in hospital; says this about Allu Arjun's absence - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Aravind visits Pushpa 2 premiere stampede victim in hospital; remarks on Allu Arjun's absence

Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

A tragic incident at the premiere of Pushpa 2: The Rule led to the death of a woman and her son's hospitalization due to a stampede. Allu Aravind visited the affected boy in the hospital and spoke about Allu Arjun's absence regarding the situation.

  • A stampede occurred at the Pushpa 2 premiere, resulting in one death and a young boy hospitalized.
  • Allu Aravind visited the hospitalized boy and expressed support for his recovery.
  • Allu Arjun's absence at the hospital has raised questions; Aravind explained legal constraints preventing visitation.
  • Arjun is facing legal action related to the incident, having been arrested and later released on bail.
“I just visited Sri Tej in the ICU. The boy has been recovering slowly... We are ready to support in any way we can to help him recover.” - Allu Aravind

The incident has sparked significant discussion regarding crowd safety and the responsibilities of public figures.

item.title: Unreal Downfall: 500 Crores To 10 Crore - M9
item.description:
Unreal Downfall: 500 Crores To 10 Crore

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 Source: M9 News

The article discusses the steep decline in filmmaker Anil Sharma's career, highlighting the contrast between his recent success with "Gadar 2" and the anticipated poor performance of his latest film, "Vanvaas."

  • Gadar 2 was a blockbuster, achieving impressive box office numbers.
  • "Vanvaas" features Nana Patekar and lacks star appeal, with low marketing.
  • The film is projected to earn less than 10 crores, a significant drop from over 500 crores for Gadar 2.
  • Anil Sharma's ability to attract audiences is called into question.
  • The film releases on December 20, yet many are unaware of its screening.
“From over a 500 crore collection, Anil will drop to a less than 10 crore average.”

This article illustrates the challenges faced by filmmakers in adapting to current cinematic trends, showcasing how quickly fortunes can shift in the film industry.
